InstructionData.Title: rad-loop-simple-control
InstructionData.Description: simple script for controlling a gas loop of some typer
InstructionData.Author: Basic IC10 Compiler
InstructionData.Instructions: # Switch on-off and see the pin's names alias tempcheck d0 #l.1 alias evacpump d1 #l.1 alias radscheck d2 #l.1 alias coolantvalve d3 #l.1 yield #l.1 # check cooled side to avoid bursting # condensation prevention # CONST DANGER_TEMP # CONST DANGER_PRESSURE # if tempCheck.Temperature Start: yield #l.21 l r0 d0 Pressure #l.23 l r3 d0 Temperature #l.24 # content-based temperature safety # if there is gas in the radiator pipe, evacPump should come on sgt r2 r0 40000 #l.30 slt r1 r3 293.15 #l.30 or r0 r2 r1 #l.30 beqz r0 24 #l.30 s d3 Setting 0 #l.31 # evacPump.Setting = 1 j 27 #l.30 blt r3 293.15 27 #l.33 s d3 Setting 1 #l.34 # evacPump.Setting = j Start #l.38 # Compiled at 2025-10-23 19:10 by Exca's Basic10.
